bossDamage: monsterName inflicted bossDamage damage on bossName .
bossUsedOneHitKillSkill: bossName used a one-hit kill skill, "bossSkillName" .
monsterDamage: bossName inflicted monsterDamage damage on monsterName .
continue:
The attack power of the monsters and the boss will become stronger with each turn.

The battle will become more and more intense.
Will you continue the battle?
monsterOtherPowerPhysicalAttack: monsterName unleashed a tremendous blow with all its might!
monsterOtherPowerSpecialAttack: Suddenly, the ultimate dragon god appeared and unleashed a devastating flame!
monsterOtherDefense: A giant shining shield appeared in front of it!
monsterOtherHeal: monsterName's entire body was enveloped in a mysterious light!
bossBuffMiss: bossName was staggered by monsterName's attack and couldn't cast the buff skill!
bossDebuffMiss: bossName was staggered by monsterName's attack and couldn't cast the debuff skill!
invalidStarted: You should push "FIGHT" button to start the boss battle.
havingWeakFeature:
monsterName has a weakness feature, "weakFeature", against bossName!
monsterName's stats have increased!!!
defeated:
The LP of monsterName has reached 0!

Everything in front of me is becoming pitch black...
usedBossSubAction: It seems that bossName is about to make a move different from usual...
